last_episode_to_air.name: Loose Ends
last_episode_to_air.overview: The new addition to Tommy's crew shocks Frank and Torgeir. Chris vows to do anything to win back Sigrid. Frank vows to hunt down Jan.

name: Lilyhammer
overview: After Frank The Fixer Tagliano testifies against his Mafia boss in New York, he enters the Witness Protection Program and makes an unusual demand: he wants to be set up with a new life in the Norwegian small town of Lillehammer or as he calls it, Lilyhammer.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After he testifies against a Mafia boss, ex-gangster Frank Tagliano enters the witness protection program and asks to be sent to Norway.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In Season 2, Frank juggles fatherhood to twins with his status as Norway's newest crime kingpin, which draws unwanted attention from British rivals.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season 3 rings in a New Year for Frank and brings all-new problems like Lithuanian gangs, Brazilian drug cartels and the unexpected return of Jan.

episodes.name: Reality Check
episodes.overview: Frank becomes Norwegian citizen "Giovanni Henriksen," meets his neighbor the chief of police, and clashes with his new country's bureaucratic culture.

episodes.name: The Flamingo
episodes.overview: Frank falls for his language teacher Sigrid and opens a nightclub that's a big hit, but he draws unwanted attention from the police and a biker gang.

episodes.name: Guantanamo Blues
episodes.overview: Now a successful local businessman, Frank joins a lucrative real estate deal but his plans are thwarted by the police, who believe he's a terrorist.

episodes.name: The Midwife
episodes.overview: Sigrid learns some surprising news, Frank's deal sours when his partner's son converts to Islam, and Geir stumbles on a clue to Frank's identity.

episodes.name: My Kind of Town
episodes.overview: Frank has a fight over a baby carriage but makes a deal to exit his real estate investment; Frank's enemies get an unexpected lead on his location.

episodes.name: Pack Your Lederhosen
episodes.overview: Flush with cash, Frank buys a new penthouse and invites Sigrid to move in, while Geir's colleagues get bad news and Mafia hitmen arrive in Norway.

episodes.name: The Babysitter
episodes.overview: The police chief suspects Frank is the link between a murder and a mysterious beating; Frank beefs up security when he learns he's in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Trolls
episodes.overview: Frank's attempt to rescue Sigrid's son leads to a spectacular shoot out and a series of shocking revelations that change both his old and new lives.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After he testifies against a Mafia boss, ex-gangster Frank Tagliano enters the witness protection program and asks to be sent to Norway.

episodes.name: Millwall Brick
episodes.overview: Torgeir's mishap with a moose and a Ferrari enrages a British thief; Frank is alarmed by his twins' proposed names; Jan makes a sweet business deal.

episodes.name: Out of Africa
episodes.overview: Frank hires a new chef through his refugee center - an acquisition that catches Torgeirs attention in more ways than one. The death of Duncan Hammer attracts both the police and his brothers crew - bringing them closer to Torgeir and Frank.

episodes.name: Fiddler's Green
episodes.overview: Frank attempts to resolve the English conflict with a bribe; Roar becomes the victim as the English plan their payback for Hammers death; The police get an interesting new applicant as Laila retires from her position as sheriff.

episodes.name: The Black Toe
episodes.overview: A robbery in Oslo inadvertently reveals Franks identity to the Norwegian National Security; A business opportunity arises as local entrepreneurs seek to make an investment in the Flamingo; Torgeir gets acquainted with the new local sheriff.

episodes.name: The Island
episodes.overview: Frank follows up on the Oslo robbery and recruits an old "friend" for help; Torgeir and Roars mother returns to Norway with a new man; Jan runs into some relationship troubles on his birthday.

episodes.name: Special Education
episodes.overview: Stanley's proposal to Torgeir's mother ends badly for all parties; Frank finally catches up with the Oslo thieves and retrieves his documents; After the refugee center shuts, Jan makes a grave mistake; Franks history still remains a threat.

episodes.name: The Freezer
episodes.overview: After acquiring a herd of reindeer, Frank gets the idea to start racing them; Delucci finds out that Robby covered for Frank, so Robby plans to have Delucci dethroned; Jans actions come back to haunt him and decides to seek asylum in Iraq.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: Frank goes back to NY to settle things with Aldo, with two unsuspected local friends.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In Season 2, Frank juggles fatherhood to twins with his status as Norway's newest crime kingpin, which draws unwanted attention from British rivals.

episodes.name: Tiger Boy
episodes.overview: It's not a happy New Year for Frank, topped off by Jan Johansen's surprise and unwanted return. Meanwhile, Roar is in Rio de Janeiro to get married.

episodes.name: Foreign Affairs
episodes.overview: Frank and Torgeir head to Brazil to save Roar from his troubles with the law, and Jan has second thoughts about his murder confession.

episodes.name: The Homecoming
episodes.overview: Frank and Torgeir have managed to free Roar from the Brazilian jail but, back in Lillehammer, the Lithuanian gang is causing trouble.

episodes.name: The Mind is Like a Monkey
episodes.overview: There 20th Anniversary of the Lillehammer Olympics is coming up, and Torgeir get his childhood dream fullfilled, that he will jump in the opening ceremony. But has he really nerves to carry?

episodes.name: Tommy
episodes.overview: An ex-mobster on a book tour in Scandinavia is victim to an assassination attempt and soon after, Frank gets a bloody former acquaintance at his door.

episodes.name: The Minstrel Boy
episodes.overview: Frank appreciate having a powerful mafia man as Tommy in the gang. But Tommy is struggling to cope with the high cost in Norway and goes behind Frank's back to earn a living.

episodes.name: The Funeral
episodes.overview: Things look good for Jan until his new girlfriend has a fateful request. Roar signs Torgeir's life away. Tommy takes his betrayal up a notch.

episodes.name: Loose Ends
episodes.overview: The new addition to Tommy's crew shocks Frank and Torgeir. Chris vows to do anything to win back Sigrid. Frank vows to hunt down Jan.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season 3 rings in a New Year for Frank and brings all-new problems like Lithuanian gangs, Brazilian drug cartels and the unexpected return of Jan.
